title: aDaikkalam enrunnai aDaiyum
sahitya:
aDaikkalam enrunnai aDaiyum enniDarai kaDaikkaN aruLAl tuDaittiDu murugA


anupallavi

  koDaikkara mIrArum konjamum sOrAmal aDiyArkkaruLai aLittiDum ayyanE


caraNam    viNNavar sirai mINDu vimOcanamura anru paNNina perum tavam phalitamura udittu
maNNulaginOr inru magizhgunrellAm ninru kaN kaNDa deivamAi kATSi tarum ayyE
